## Building Continuum â€” Chapter 7 â€” Durability Over Virality

Modern platforms optimize for engagement and amplification. Continuum rejects that metric. This chapter explores why durability â€” not reach â€” became the guiding principle, and why obscurity can be healthier than applause.
